footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Kinich | Update Date: 09/21/2024 | Editor: aqua.sh

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Fang of the Mountain King__
Signature BiS.

__Beacon of the Reed Sea__
Best 5* alternative. Can risk overcapping on CRIT Rate but can take advantage of the passive through burning self damage.

__Earth Shaker R5__
Best F2P option. Passive is easily triggered and greatly benefits Kinich.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Verdict, Wolf's Gravestone, Unforged, Redhorn Stonethresher, Serpent Spine R5, etc.__
ATK/CRIT stat sticks. Generally not ideal but can work.

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Canopy Hunter: Riding High 
**2)** Elemental Burst: Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Since the Obsidian Codex set grants Kinich a massive amount of CRIT rate, it can be beneficial to prioritize ATK% and CRIT damage rolls. However, his damage is mainly from a few large hits so going for high amounts of CRIT rate (~90%) can also be beneficial.

While his damage is mainly from skill damage, the Golden Troupe 4pc is not reccomended since he requires a lot of field time and cannot make use of this bonus.
